attributes.action: stop Military High Ranks Retiring on Full Pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the Military and the rest of the Country are going through tough times with every public sector taking cuts, how can we justify High Ranks retiring on full pay. RAF for example: An Air Commodore will retire on £95000 minumum each year till he/she dies. All this going on when sections are shutting due to funds and troops at war not having the equipment they need.
